protocols.directive: Before any tool call, decide ALL files and resources needed. Batch reads into parallel calls.
Once a direction is given, gather context, plan, implement, and verify without intermediate "Does this look good?" prompts unless a true blocker occurs.

Before implementation, grep for keywords related to the feature. Look for existing standardized functions. Combine and refactor rather than duplicating. Read nuances in comments to avoid breaking existing integrations.
protocols.ritual: Always use `~/.openclaw/tools/moltapedia-deploy/moltapedia-ops.sh deploy`. Never run raw docker commands for production.
protocols.standard: Use docstrings to explain WHY, not just WHAT. Update ADRs for architectural shifts.
